about_the_game:
Welcome to Roll 'n' Watch, this game brings the excitement of those viral YouTube marble racing videos right to your fingertips and provides a purely simulated race. This game embodies the word "Watch" as you customize marbles and name each one, you will only watch the marbles roll to see who becomes the winner.

Prepare to embark on a journey filled with intense races, mesmerizing tracks, and great customization options for your marbles. Roll 'n' Watch brings the exhilarating world of marble racing to your screen. Customize your marbles with vibrant colors and overlays, and watch them race on diverse and beautifully crafted tracks. With automated races, all you need to do is set up your marbles, choose your track, and enjoy the show.

Each race is a test of luck and physics, offering endless entertainment and surprises. Whether you’re a casual player looking for some fun or a marble racing enthusiast, Roll 'n' Watch provides an engaging and customizable experience.

Key Features:

  • Authentic Marble Racing Experience: Immerse yourself in the adrenaline-pumping world of marble racing. Experience the same nail-biting excitement and unpredictability that you've come to love from those viral YouTube videos.
  • Automated Marble Races: Watch as 8 unique marbles roll, bounce, and speed through intricately designed tracks. Each race is a spectacle of physics and fun!
  • Extensive Customization: Personalize each of your 8 marbles with a variety of base colors and eye-catching overlays. Make your marbles stand out with unique designs that reflect your style.
  • Name Your Marbles: Give each marble a personality by assigning it a name. Whether it’s Speedy, Flash, or Glitter, your marbles will race with their unique identities.
  • Choose Your Tracks: Select from a variety of challenging and visually stunning tracks. Each track offers a new set of obstacles and thrills, ensuring that no two races are the same.
  • Spectator Mode: Enjoy the race from multiple camera angles and get close-up views of the action. Cheer for your favorites as they navigate through twists, turns, and jumps.

Are you ready to roll? This exciting simulation game offers customization and nail-biting races that will keep you on the edge of your seat. Join the marble mayhem and become the ultimate marble racing champion!

Developers:

  • Project Lead / Lead Programmer: MrButier
  • Lead Artist: Rep
  • Audio Designer: Jermx505
